properties.sfomuseum:description: Advertisement from April 24, 1948 issue of Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “Across the Pacific / only Pan American offers you the luxury of Sleeperette service to Australia, New Zealand or the Orient”; color illustration of woman holding koala, with Pacific route map and photographic images of stewardess at berth and couple drinking champagne.
properties.sfomuseum:subject: Pan Am promotional advertisement
